item.title: What Makes a Graduate Program Valuable?
item.description: You’re investing a substantial amount of time, energy, and most importantly money into pursuing a graduate degree. Here are a few characteristics to look at when evaluating potential graduate programs.

item.title: GIS Curriculum
item.description: Courses I would like to see in a competitive GIS program:
